about: Presets related to the UNHCR project

values.label: Geographic coverage
values.help_text: Please start typing the name(s) of the most precise location(s) where the data was collected. E.g. if the data collection took place in Kakuma camp, start typing and then select Kakuma (Pop. of Concern Location). For more information on the list of locations: https://data2.unhcr.org/en/geoservices/
values.form_placeholder: Start typing the location or locations names
